name: PiActive DEET FREE Airosol Insect Repellent 150g BOV S
categories: DEET FREE Airosol Insect Repellent 150g BOV S
description: The convenience of spray on bug spray with no nasty propellants. PiActive is a nice alternative to DEET-based repellents, using a formula containing 20% Icaridin, making it a good choice for children from 6 months to 12 years.Active ingredient is Icaridin 20%, with 0% DEET.Aerosol free Airosol™ BOV technology uses pressurized air as its propellant.Formula is non-irritating, non-greasy and non-allergenic.Provides 12-hour protection from ticks, 12-hour protection from mosquitoes, and 10 hours from black flies.Suited to kids from 6 months and up.Icardin formula won’t damage plastics or synthetics.
